data.title: AlignBandColors: Inter-color-band image alignment tool
data.name: SpArcFiRe
data.description: SPiral ARC FInder and REporter - find spiral arcs in galaxies.... or maybe hurricanes too?

evidence: "SpArcFiRe\nSPiral ARC FInder and REporter - find spiral arcs in galaxies.... or maybe hurricanes too?" (describes a domain-specific analysis tool users run).
Usage section shows direct command-line execution: "~/SpArcFiRe/scripts/SpArcFiRe ... {inDir} {tmpDir} {outDir}" indicating it is an end-user program, not a library.

README only describes cloning/using scripts in the repo and a Windows setup guide, with no mention of package managers, containers, or binary installers, implying distribution via the source repository.
